website_summaries.verdict: Offering good value and durability, this yoga strap is great for beginners.
pros: Inexpensive yet strong and well made
Color choices are great – 6 in all
Comes with instructional video provided in online link
Comfortable to grip and feels good on the skin
cons: Only available in 6-feet, which is too short for some, especially in class, but works for general stretching at home

customer_reviews.title: A staple for my yoga routine
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for and it matches my yoga mat! You can't beat the price either. Why use a strap at your yoga studio where a millllllllllllion other's feet have touched it, when you can buy and use your own? Excellent yoga/stretching strap, excellent price.
customer_reviews.author: Couple from Cali

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful strap!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this yoga strap! It is so functional and has really helped me get some deeper stretches in my yoga practice. The strap has plenty of length without being too much and the color is just as pictured. Truly a great purchase and I have no doubt I will end up purchasing from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Scott

customer_reviews.title: Love my GREEN Yoga Strap!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly. Note that the instructional video will not come in the mail. It is an online link provided in your email. I am just starting to learn about Yoga, stretching and how in can affect your health. But I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: C. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Seams to be be extremely sturdy and I expect to last a long time
customer_reviews.text: The strap is exactly as described and just what I needed to complete physical therapy stretches at home. Seems to be be extremely sturdy and I expect to last a long time. I am 6'1 with very long arms and legs....length is more then enough.
customer_reviews.author: loren calevro

customer_reviews.title: Nice color, seems sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I like the green, it's vibrant and like the inside of a lime. Seems like it's going to be sturdy. I don't remember if it displayed the length, but for some reason I thought it was going to be longer. It works well for me but I'm 5'3 tall. I would not recommend for a person of 6 feet or more, depending on how you plan on using it. For example, I hold onto each end but if you loop it around and use the D ring and only hold one end it will probably be just fine. If that makes sense. Anyway, I like it. It serves my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Emily D. H.

customer_reviews.title: A great yoga band!
customer_reviews.text: I don't have a ton of experience with yoga bands but I am very happy with this one! It seems to get the job done and is more than enough for what I need in my beginner classes! The color is the perfect shade and the material is soft on your skin but it is clearly very strong! This was the perfect yoga investment!
customer_reviews.author: Faith Ann

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, and a lovely shade of green
customer_reviews.text: This yoga strap feels strong and well made, and I love the green color. The color is true to the product images. It isn't scratchy at all, and is easy to grip on to during poses. Previously I’d been using a robe belt as a makeshift yoga strap, which worked alright but the belt was stretchy and wasn’t suitable for all poses. This strap has no give, and I’m quite pleased with it. Product provided at a discount for evaluation and reviewing purposes.
customer_reviews.author: S. Kay

customer_reviews.title: a must have for any yoga practice
customer_reviews.text: if you are even going to attempt yoga and you are a male over 25 years old, save yourself the embarrassment and buy this product. WOW - we are not flexible and this little strap helps you from over exerting yourself to maintain those long hold
customer_reviews.author: Andre

customer_reviews.title: A little on the thin side.
customer_reviews.text: It’s nice to have so many pretty colors available. Everyone in the house has their own special color. While the strap is sterdy, it is a bit thinner than my others. Despite it being thinner than other straps I own, it’s still very nice. Would I buy another one?... I’ll wait to see if it starts to get a curl. Check back later for update. :)
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend, very useful
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described and pictured! I love it! I went back to order another one in a different color so I'll have a nice variety but they were completely sold out. Yap every color, gone. Now I'm anxiously awaiting and hoping they will get more in so I can add to my collection.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa C

customer_reviews.title: For only  6-7$, very nice!
customer_reviews.text: I bought three of these in purple, blue and yellow. Nice and sturdy feeling, and the consistency of quality was the same in all three! Very good for the price!
customer_reviews.author: srb363

customer_reviews.title: Very nice little strap
customer_reviews.text: This strap is pretty typical - exactly what you'd expect. It seems to be well made and sturdy, and looks like it'll hold up well. I'm not really sure what else you can say about it, other than it's a good price and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Mika Hutton

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, good price
customer_reviews.text: The strap arrived on time, is good quality and the color in the photo is true. I'm quite happy with it! I even accidentally double-ordered (user error) and decided to keep the second one because my husband likes having one, too!
customer_reviews.author: CreativeC

customer_reviews.title: Nice, well-made strong strap.
customer_reviews.text: This yoga strap is strong and well made. I ordered this to use with an A.M. yoga DVD. It makes stretching much easier and allows movements that would be impossible without it. It was priced just right for what it is.
customer_reviews.author: BETH J

customer_reviews.title: Great yoga strap
customer_reviews.text: The yoga strap works excellent! We use it in therapy for stretching and I love the color and how durable it is! thanks for having your business! We will buy from you again when we need an item you have!
customer_reviews.author: Skiing Rose

customer_reviews.title: Love the strap
customer_reviews.text: I love the strap and use it every time I do yoga, or even basic stretching. But I don't recall ever getting the instructional video it claims to give. Maybe I didn't read it right, or something. I was very much a beginner with yoga when I bought this, so just got on YouTube to see what all you can do with these. For the price it was still a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Stahr

customer_reviews.title: Even if you're not a yogi this is great for any level of fitness and stretching
customer_reviews.text: Helps deepen the stretch. Even if you're not a yogi this is great for any level of fitness and stretching. If you're like me, and not very bendy, this helps you work towards a full stretch and relieves some of the pain that comes with not being very flexible.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Holds it shape
customer_reviews.text: I've had this a few days. Used it a lot. Fold it in quarters and keep it on top of my mat. Works great. Perfect size for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Chrispy11

customer_reviews.title: Great Strap
customer_reviews.text: I like having my own toys for class, especially with cold and flu season approaching. Plus this gives me the opportunity to get some good stretching in at home. Durable, inexpensive, and effective. great value.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Morgan-Oakes

customer_reviews.title: Great for yoga
customer_reviews.text: I am new to yoga and find some moves harder than others. We use this exact product in class, so I purchased to use at home. Same solid quality and I can get better with my moves from the privacy of my own home. Very happy with it all.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Kay

customer_reviews.title: For Yoga or just a big long strap
customer_reviews.text: I'm using it for Yoga, but guessing it could be used for other things that you need a long strap for. Sturdy. Beautiful color (the light blue).
customer_reviews.author: Busymom

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This strap is pretty great for the cost! I’m able to use it for all yoga stretching needs and it does the trick. Wide enough strap and sturdy enough. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy Obermeyer

customer_reviews.title: Just as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: I love this yoga strap. It's very well made and is just as advertised. I do yoga almost every morning and have used this strap several times. I would highly recommend this yoga strap to anyone interested in purchasing one.
customer_reviews.author: Denise G

customer_reviews.title: Good value for occasional use
customer_reviews.text: Not the sturdiest strap, but great value for occasional use for stretching. I wanted something for those yoga stretches I can’t do, and didn’t want to spend a lot on something I don’t use for every practice.
customer_reviews.author: S. Kerr

customer_reviews.title: Great Yoga Strap
customer_reviews.text: Works every bit as well as the straps I used in professional yoga studios. Lightweight & sturdy. Long enough for taller individuals.
customer_reviews.author: Topvike

customer_reviews.title: Super Addition to your Yoga Workout!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Sturdy, well made and attractive. Super addition to your Yoga workout! would recommend the product and my first experience with this vendor was 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: S.P.

customer_reviews.title: Nice strap. Many colors to choose from.
customer_reviews.text: Most yoga studio uses 7-8 ft straps. I only needed a 6 footer. I bought one to match the color of my mat. So far, I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Tony C.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Yoga strap arrived on time, color was as shown, and it feels like good quality, especially for the price! No problems with the stitching or the D-ring - what else is there to say - looks great, and does the job!
customer_reviews.author: Susan McLin

customer_reviews.title: Works for my needs
customer_reviews.text: I use this for home PT and the PT uses it when I'm at therapy good for stretching where you can use for that purpose.
customer_reviews.author: kaytmay

customer_reviews.title: Too short
customer_reviews.text: Nice durable strap. However, it’s a bit short when doing backwards stretches during yoga. If I order again I would definitely go with a longer versions
customer_reviews.author: Martha Stone

customer_reviews.title: Nice color; not a sturdy material
customer_reviews.text: This strap was not as heavy as most exercise straps. It is a nice color and the strap usable, but it slides and twists more than you would expect if you have used heavier straps.
customer_reviews.author: mkw4444

customer_reviews.title: Strong belt - pretty color
customer_reviews.text: This belt is just as advertised. It is strong and I have used it in my yoga class and am very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great yoga belt
customer_reviews.text: I use this in yoga and in my physical therapy. Very reasonably priced, sturdy and a perfect length.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased 3 different types of stretching aids. This is one of the worst. As you pull it gets so tight and uncomfortable on your feet (or at least my feet).
customer_reviews.author: Kvasir119

customer_reviews.title: beautiful color. I love using it and its so ...
customer_reviews.text: Soft, beautiful color. I love using it and its so helpful for me. I have been doing yoga on my own more than going to the studio and I always get so frustrated when I want to get a good stretch but know I can do better if I had a strap. I would recommend these to everyone. Great price for a great stretching tool.
customer_reviews.author: Maranda

customer_reviews.title: Strappy happy😊🕉️
customer_reviews.text: The lavender is a nice soft shade.I have been using it every day and love it👍
customer_reviews.author: Lil Mo

customer_reviews.title: use to prevent plantar fasciitis
customer_reviews.text: Great for general stretching... Use for hamstrings and calves. If you've ever had plantar fasciitis, you know it's not pleasant. This strap makes the calf /foot stretch easy. Also great for tight hamstrings.
customer_reviews.author: NorthernGirl

customer_reviews.title: Long yoga strap
customer_reviews.text: This strap is perfect for flexibility and has plenty of length for leg stretches. I got the lime green color and it arrived exactly as pictured. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Micah C.

customer_reviews.title: I like these
customer_reviews.text: I really like these stalls they are long enough that I can do a lot with them but they are easy to shorten to get a better stretch
customer_reviews.author: Deanna Saindon

customer_reviews.title: Helps with stretches
customer_reviews.text: Ordered to help with PT stretches. I have only used it a few times so I can not comment on durability yet.Arrived quickly and in great condition
customer_reviews.author: mommyof2

customer_reviews.title: Great exercise strap!!
customer_reviews.text: I have a couple for stretching everyday.I also bought this for a gift.Very satisfied !!!
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Product matches its picture
customer_reviews.text: It's a good, sturdy quality strap. Looks just like its picture. No problems with it whatsoever!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Ross

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Love it! No major issues, but the strap can get a bit slippery to grip (I have really sweaty hands) but using a grip aid seems to help!
customer_reviews.author: M Petersen

customer_reviews.title: Helpful for  stretches after knee surgery.
customer_reviews.text: I am using it to do painful exercises after knee replacement. The exercises are not fun, and actually are excruciatingly painful, but the strap works well.
customer_reviews.author: Nana21

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for my yoga stretching. Love the color. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Maricruz Navidad

customer_reviews.title: Good product. Nice color
customer_reviews.text: Works as it’s supposed. Nice color on top of sll
customer_reviews.author: Trivity

customer_reviews.title: Great for leg stretches.
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 as a gift for my some who has a physical job. He likes to do yoga at the end of the day and he said these straps really help, especially when gently stretching out his leg muscles.
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: Cheap China Junk
customer_reviews.text: Strap is very thin and not as long as normal yoga strap. Made in China!
customer_reviews.author: PacificProf

customer_reviews.title: The strap is just wide enough to be comfortable across the ball of my foot and the weaving ...
customer_reviews.text: This strap works very well for me. The strap is just wide enough to be comfortable across the ball of my foot and the weaving of the strap gives me a no slip grip.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as represented.
customer_reviews.text: The turquoise is a lovely shade. The 6 foot length is plenty for me at 5’6”.
customer_reviews.author: Aida

customer_reviews.title: The quality is great, but they are only 6 feet and that ...
customer_reviews.text: The quality is great, but they are only 6 feet and that is very short if you are practicing with a variety of postures.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed! Great strap to assist with stretching
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I would not recommend but if you are using for casual stretching at ...
customer_reviews.text: These have held up but are shorter than I need for yoga. If you do a lot of yoga, I would not recommend but if you are using for casual stretching at home, they work.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Jean

customer_reviews.title: Durable and Doesn't Stretch Much - Lovely color!
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this yoga strap. I haven't used it too much yet but I can definitely notice that it is durable. Under pressure it barely stretches and I had no problem with the D clasp. Also the color is lovely! I would recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Paulina D

customer_reviews.title: Nice strap for yogis
customer_reviews.text: Nice strap! I like the rings at the end so I can slip the strap through and adjust it to the size you want. I like the color because it matches my other yoga gear! I think its a reasonable price compared to the other straps on amazon. Great investment if you are serious about doing yoga!
customer_reviews.author: Madison

customer_reviews.title: Recommended!
customer_reviews.text: I love the color, length and loop closure of this sturdy woven belt.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Pretty color and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I have not reviewed the videos yet but I have used it based on stretches I know and so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: far_side101

customer_reviews.title: Great for a stretch after a work out
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what I needed! Great for a stretch after a work out . Recommended by my trainer and has been a life safer ... feels amazing after a tough work out.
customer_reviews.author: karen m

customer_reviews.title: Yoga or exercise strap.
customer_reviews.text: I am finding this Yoga strap so useful. I am using it for therapy after I have 2 new knees. It also is very easy to use when traveling. I certainly would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Roberta Bell

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Yoga Strap
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and just as I thought it would look like. I love the turquoise blue color. Well made and well packaged.
customer_reviews.author: khunter00

customer_reviews.title: Perfect strap for yoga !
customer_reviews.text: Strong, nice color choices, good price and fast delivery. Now I have my own even if I ever go back to an in studio yoga class. I’m getting used to doing online classes. I have everything they have in the classes and no extra costs.
customer_reviews.author: cindy ogden

customer_reviews.title: It is ok
customer_reviews.text: I have used these products before in yoga studios but this particular strap that I order during lockdown is not of the same quality. It says it is cotton but it doesn't have the same feel as others, it feels more synthetic so it is rougher and it doesn't hold the shape. Plus it is too short.
customer_reviews.author: jeanine

customer_reviews.title: exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I needed yoga straps to assist in stretching. These fit the bill exactly.
customer_reviews.author: E. Dennison

customer_reviews.title: Great for workouts
customer_reviews.text: Everyone in my family needs a yoga strap. They all make rounded back toe touching. Now their hamstrings have a chance to stretch properly. I bought three.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne lowrie

customer_reviews.title: Love the purple color too!
customer_reviews.text: I used this strap in physical Therapy and wanted to continue at home. It is comfortable and easy to use. I also downloaded the video with Yoga instructions. Great!!
customer_reviews.author: Grama

customer_reviews.title: Handy tool for yoga stretches
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and good quality. Great for yoga My GF love it Handy tool to improve your stretches and yoga poses.
customer_reviews.author: C. Desmaras

customer_reviews.title: Super cheap, lightweight material
customer_reviews.text: Super cheap, lightweight material. I tried using it once, and it felt like thin plastic that did not give me any leverage at all for the stretching my physical therapist wanted me to do with it. I ended up throwing it in the trash rather than taking the time to mail it back to the vendor. Really bad purchase. Luckily, at least it was inexpensive.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Kerry Dagodag

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS GREAT, I LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS GREAT, I LOVE IT, EASY TO USE AND GREAT RESULT,PLUS I LOVE THE COLOR,FEELS GOOD ON YOU SKIN AND HAVE THE PERFECT MEASURE FOR YOU FEET WORK OUT..THE DELIVERY WAS FAST..THANK YOU
customer_reviews.author: MARIBEL TORRES

customer_reviews.title: Great yoga belt
customer_reviews.text: I love this belt! I purchased it for a class & I really enjoy using it. The length is fine for someone of average height (I'm 5'4) but if you're taller I would say find one longer.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Great Yoga Strap
customer_reviews.text: Works great ~ especially since I am doing yoga at home these days.
customer_reviews.author: E. A. Dahill

customer_reviews.title: I bought one of these for myself and loved it. My boyfriend loved it so much too ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these for myself and loved it. My boyfriend loved it so much too that I had to order him his own so I could have mine back.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney O

customer_reviews.title: Great quality strap at great price
customer_reviews.text: LOVE my yoga strap! Shipped fast and received exactly as described! Not just for yoga-perfect for quad stretches and heel slides after my knee replacement.
customer_reviews.author: kath24

customer_reviews.title: The shipping was super fast, and we couldn't be more pleased
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my wife to help her with stretches for her feet and legs. This exactly what she needed. The shipping was super fast, and we couldn't be more pleased! Great to deal with!
customer_reviews.author: George Steven Fears

customer_reviews.title: Yoga strap is so useful for stretching
customer_reviews.text: Same type used at the gym so I knew it was just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene Peek

customer_reviews.title: No instructional video
customer_reviews.text: Have not tried the strap yet. There was no instructional video as listed in the description.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yoga Strap - nice product
customer_reviews.text: Very functional and attractive product and the price seemed to be reasonable. Arrived on time and packaged appropriately and came with additional helpful information.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My wife has found the strap to be very useful for rehab back exercises.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Lawler

customer_reviews.title: Durable and perfect length
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and length. Durable and I really like the color. I like to use it with my yoga workouts.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy P.

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Such a pretty color and it arrived ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Such a pretty color and it arrived so quickly. I was able to use it 2 days after ordering it. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: I have a lot of hip and low back problems ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a lot of hip and low back problems and this is so much easier than a towel to help me stretch.
customer_reviews.author: TJS

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Used a yoga belt in therapy for my arthritic knees; taught how to use it correctly. This belt matches exactly what I used in therapy and works perfectly. Excellent!

customer_reviews.title: Soft and sturdy yoga strap
customer_reviews.text: The strap feels soft in the hand and seems well-made. It seems sturdy. Will see how it holds up.

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Seems of good quality and workmanship. Does what it is intended to do. No complaints yet.

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I ordered it to match my yoga mat. I haven't used them yet because I am still recovering from surgery.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I use it everyday to get flexibility and keep it and it's everything that i needed after my injury on my knee from a car accident

customer_reviews.title: great quality
customer_reviews.text: bought for my sister after her knee surgery to help her move her leg and elevate her it by herself.

customer_reviews.title: Quality is nice, but very disappointed in length
customer_reviews.text: Strap is not as long as straps I have used in yoga studio. It will not be long enough for certain stretches - and especially not long enough for taller members of my family. Quality is nice, but very disappointed in length.
customer_reviews.author: PB from Pickerington

customer_reviews.title: Great prop addition for yoga
customer_reviews.text: and can be used for many purposes I'm sure. It's strong, portable, and I love the color. Thank you!

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: What can you say about a yoga strap besides it does it's job. Love the color.

customer_reviews.text: Very good material and firm. It would be better if instructions would have came for different yoga stretches.

customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this strap! Well made / great color

customer_reviews.title: This is a sturdy strap that was shipped very quickly and is just ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a sturdy strap that was shipped very quickly and is just as it appears in the picture. Great quality for the price.

customer_reviews.title: Not a full size strap
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed with this item. Is not a full-size yoga strap. It’s not as wide and most importantly not as long. I am going to return it as it won’t do what I needed to do.

customer_reviews.title: Yoga strap
customer_reviews.text: It is exactly what I wanted and it was delivered super fast...thanks much!

customer_reviews.text: A bit more pliable than straps I'm used to at the gym. Still gets the job done, just folds over in hand when gripping.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful yoga strap!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly and great price for a yoga strap. It's great quality and extremely sturdy.

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I use this one for travel, so that I can keep up with my stretching.

customer_reviews.text: 5-Star Rating – Love it! It was exactly what I expected and arrived on time. Perfect!!

customer_reviews.title: Great strap
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the green, and I love the color! This is the first strap I’ve purchased. Very durable.

customer_reviews.title: Good fit.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, this strap is pretty sturdy. It also is convenient for travel, fits in my bag so easily.

product_meta.title: Yoga Strap Best for Stretching - 6 Colors Instructional Video - Durable Cotton with Metal D-Ring - by FitLifestyleCo
feature_bullets: IMPROVE AND INCREASE YOUR FLEXIBILITY. You can gradually build up flexibility by moving your arms further on the strap. NICE COLORS - blue, green, black, purple, red or yellow, choose your favorite cool color
REACH POSES YOU HAVE NEVER BEEN BEFORE. Sustain proper form in poses for longer time, holding posture will become easier, whether you are beginner, advanced or pro, men or women
GRASP LIMBS. Straps are enabling you to grasp limbs that are otherwise too far away. For example if you can not touch your toes, the strap/belt will help you to bridge that gap
INCREASE YOUR STRENGTH AND ENDURANCE. Strap is widely used in physical therapy for rehabilitation, recovery and stretching
FREE INSTRUCTIONAL VIDEO (posted on YouTube), 100 % money back guarantee for 30 days, excellent customer service. Highest quality sturdy cotton with Metal D-Ring, length 6 foot(70.8inch) x wide 1.5"
